                           Release Notes

Comments :
James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. 
His intelligence and unconventional attitude attract the attention of 
veteran Walter Burke who squires him through the Agency&#039;s difficult 
training courses and helps him to quickly rise through the ranks. Clayton 
is then given a special assignment, to root out a suspected mole that has 
infiltrated the Agency.

Director : Roger Donaldson

Writers: Roger Towne
